title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From vibe to live in minutes with Heroku AI PaaS (AIM250)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Heroku AI PaaS 在几分钟内从构思到上线 (AIM250)
abstract: Accelerate your AI application development on AWS with Heroku, a fully-managed cloud application AI PaaS. Learn how to easily integrate leading AI models and build intelligent workflows using your familiar languages, while gaining control over costs and customization. Discover how Heroku's streamlined infrastructure frees your team to focus on AI innovation and faster iteration on AWS, without the overhead of managing complex AI infrastructure. Join us to learn how you can empower your cloud-native applications with the potential of AI through Heroku's intuitive platform. This presentation is brought to you by Heroku from Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 使用 Heroku（一个完全托管的云应用程序 AI PaaS）在 AWS 上加速您的 AI 应用程序开发。了解如何轻松集成领先的 AI 模型，并使用您熟悉的语言构建智能工作流，同时获得对成本和自定义的控制。探索 Heroku 的简化基础设施如何让您的团队专注于 AI 创新和在 AWS 上更快速的迭代，而无需管理复杂的 AI 基础设施的开销。加入我们，了解如何通过 Heroku 直观的平台为您的云原生应用程序赋予 AI 的潜力。本演示由 Salesforce 旗下的 Heroku（AWS 合作伙伴）为您呈现。
